review: Everything is great EXCEPT Netflix rarely works. It will work fine, and then suddenly titles will not load like there is a connectivity error. I check the Internet connection and everything is fine. I have to uninstall the app and reinstall it to get Netflix to work again (for awhile at least). If they fixed this I would give this five stars. Netflix is all I watch so I'm going with two.
author: Tyler Parks

review: I just got the fire tv stick today. Setting this up was a breeze. So very easy. It came with an HDMI converter - everything you need is in the box. I basically just wanted to be able to watch Netflix on TV (without a computer) and have no issues with that part of it. I didn't really get to navigate the rest of the programming. If I have any issues I will update my review.My only real issue is that I opted for free shipping. I ordered January 8 and it came on February 6. Almost one month. TOOK TOO LONG TO SHIP. If you don't want to wait a month opt for something other than the free shipping.
author: Amazon Customer
